item.title: Line bikes placed overnight in parking spot, 10th July
item.description:
Overnight one of the parking bays outside 36 Pellerin Road has been filled with lime bikes. This has been raised with Lime but please can it be flagged to them by the council as inappropriate bike parking and please have them moved?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35-39, Pellerin Road, Shacklewell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree growth, 10th July
item.description:
The tree has not been pruned for many years. Our house has suffered from subsidence in the past and it needs a cut. Happy to contribute financially if required.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dyne Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trailer sticks out into road, dangerous, 10th July
item.description:
Trailer sticks out into oncoming traffic. It is black, no reflective lights showing to oncoming vehicles down Sundridge Avenue and protrudes so far into the road that cars have to drive across lanes on a bend. Please can you ask the owner to re park so that the trailer is against the curb.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Copley Dene, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previously repaired sinkhole, sinking again, 10th July
item.description:
This has been previously repaired, investigated and resurfaced and again it's sinking.the noise and vibrations through ours and neighbours houses is horrendous when cars and lorries hit it at speed. Will.no doubt cause an accident soon.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 89, Southlands Road, Bickley, London
